column3: 2015 billie ray alexander was born on march 27
column4: 1939 to royal and zelphia (yardley) alexander in ames
column5: iowa. he served in the u. s. marines corp from 1959 1963. billie passed away june 12
column6: at mercy medical center in des moines
column7: he was 76 years of age. billie is survived by two sons
column8: john (laura) alexander and rodney hibbs both of ames; four grand children and four great grand children; three sisters and two brothers. he was preceded in death by his parents; one sister and two brothers. memorials may be addressed to the family.
